SELECT users.id as userId, users.nickname as nickname, DATE_FORMAT(users.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, DATEDIFF(NOW(), users.create_time) + 1 AS daysDiff FROM system_users AS users WHERE users.deleted = false AND users.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') and users.create_time < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND users.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM trade_order ORDER BY id) ORDER BY users.id limit #{start}, #{size}
